title: Iran's regime is still intact - the coming days will show if it can hold out
description: Iran's surviving leaders are in crisis mode, battling to project security as US and Israel strikes continue.
content:
The killing of Iran's Supreme Leader, Ali Khamenei, in the opening wave of joint US-Israeli strikes has pushed the Islamic Republic into its most precarious moment since 1979.
The operation targeted senior military and political leadership in what Wa... [4479 chars]

title: Deadly Texas bar shooting 'potentially an act of terrorism', FBI says
description: Two people were killed and 14 injured, with the suspected gunman, identified by some media outlets, also shot dead.
content:
Two people were killed and over a dozen injured in a shooting outside a beer garden in Austin, Texas, in an incident the FBI says may be related to terrorism.
The suspect has been identified as Ndiaga Diagne, a naturalised American citizen born in Se... [3674 chars]

title: Labour Together ‘making clean break’ after former director resigns as minister
description: Thinktank’s board distances itself from Josh Simons’ decision in 2023 to hire lobbying firm to investigate journalists
content:
A Labour thinktank that helped Keir Starmer into No 10 has said it is making a “clean break” from the past after its former director, Josh Simons, resigned as a minister over a report falsely linking journalists to a “pro-Kremlin” network.
The board ... [5115 chars]

title: Crash causes delays with reports of police, ambulance and air ambulance at scene
description: Collision reported to have happened on the junction of the A483 and the A525 in Wrexham
content:
